references.reason: This paper provides a technical report on GPT-4, a large language model which is central to the discussion on model collapse.
This paper is among the first to theoretically study the phenomenon of model collapse in generative models.

references.paper_title: On the stability of iterative retraining of generative models on their own data
references.reason: This paper provides an analysis of the stability of iterative retraining of generative models on their own data, a crucial aspect of model collapse.

references.paper_title: Optimal rates for the regularized least-squares algorithm
references.reason: This paper provides optimal convergence rates for the regularized least-squares algorithm, which is used as a foundation for the theoretical analysis in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Generalization error rates in kernel regression: The crossover from the noiseless to noisy regime
references.reason: This paper provides a detailed analysis of generalization error rates in kernel regression, which is directly relevant to the analysis of model collapse in the current paper.
